titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Appropriations.

calendar.text: Committee on Appropriations ordered to be reported an original measure.

action.text: Committee on Appropriations. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Byrd under the authority of the order of Jan 5, 93. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules.

calendar.text: Committee on Rules. Provisions of measure incorporated into measure S.RES. 71 ordered to be reported.

bill.summary: 2/1/1993--Introduced. Authorizes expenditures by the Senate Committee on Appropriations for the 103d Congress.
